  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x140
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x140
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x116
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 314x19
          text run at (0,0) width 314: "There should be a green block under this paragraph."
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,36) size 80x80 [bgcolor=#008000]
